ciss_vae.utils.helpers.get_imputed_df

get_imputed_df(model, data_loader, device='cpu')[source]

Given trained model and cluster dataset object, get imputed dataset. :type model: CISSVAE :param model: Trained CISSVAE model (should be in eval() mode) :type data_loader: :param data_loader: DataLoader for the original ClusterDataset

Returns:

pandas DataFrame of imputed (unscaled) data

Return type:

imputed_df
